item.title: Video Editor for YouTube channel MUST be HIGHLY PROFICIENT with latest AFTER EFFECTS - Upwork
item.description:
We have an existing YouTube channel and have recently built a brand new animated framework which will form the basis of a new series of videos when combined with footage.
We are looking for an experienced editor who is highly proficient in (and uses the latest version of) After Effects. This is ESSENTIAL.
The project is a combination of sourcing and editing footage AND understanding how to change editable parts of the AE compositions in order to create the final videos.  
All the AE elements are already build, are simple to operate and are provided for you. But you MUST have access to the latest versions of AE and a HIGH level of understanding and proficiency.  
If you have these skills then the project will be a simple and quick process.  We currently produce 2 x 10 min videos per week. The role may be ongoing for the right candidate with the pay rate to be discussed.  We work via Trello and Slack for all communication and workflow, so experience of these would also be preferred.

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 18, 2024 01:58 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Digital Video, Footage-Based Video, Concept Video, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Video Post-Editing, Video Intro & Outro, Video Production
Skills: Digital Video, Footage-Based Video, Concept Video, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Video Post-Editing, Video Intro & Outro, Video Production
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Video Production with Accessibility Features - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video producer who can create a series of videos with accessibility features. The videos need to include closed captions, audio descriptions, and ASL interpretations to ensure full accessibility for all viewers.

Send me 1-3 links of videos you did with :
- closed captions,
- audio descriptions, and
- ASL interpretations

The ideal candidate should have experience in producing accessible videos and be familiar with the necessary technical requirements.



Skills required:

item.title: videographer in Chihuahua Mexico - Upwork
item.description:
**Job Title: Videographer Needed for Promo Video in Chihuahua, Mexico**

**Job Description:**
We are an independent travel agency looking to hire a talented videographer based in Chihuahua, Mexico, to create a high-quality promotional video. This video will showcase the beauty, culture, and unique experiences that travelers can enjoy in Chihuahua, and will be used to attract tourists to the region.

**Responsibilities:**
- Collaborate with our team to understand the vision and goals for the promo video.
- Scout and select locations that highlight the best of Chihuahua's attractions, including natural landscapes, historical sites, cultural events, and local cuisine.
- Capture high-quality video footage that reflects the charm and vibrancy of Chihuahua.
- Edit the footage into a compelling 2-3 minute promotional video.
- Incorporate music, graphics, and other elements to enhance the video’s appeal.
- Ensure the final product aligns with our brand and marketing strategy.

**Requirements:**
- Proven experience in videography and video editing, with a portfolio of previous work.
- Familiarity with Chihuahua's landmarks and cultural highlights.
- Access to professional video equipment and editing software.
- Strong creative vision and storytelling skills.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
- Excellent communication skills to collaborate with our team remotely.

**Preferred Qualifications:**
- Experience in travel or tourism videography.
- Knowledge of the local language and customs.
- Ability to provide drone footage.

**Application Process:**
Please submit your application with the following:
- A brief cover letter detailing your experience and why you are a good fit for this project.
- Links to your portfolio or examples of previous work.
- Your availability and estimated timeline for completing the project.

**About Us:**
We are a passionate team dedicated to promoting travel and adventure. Our goal is to inspire people to explore new destinations and create unforgettable memories. Join us in showcasing the beauty of Chihuahua and helping travelers discover all that this incredible region has to offer.

We look forward to seeing your creative vision and bringing the beauty of Chihuahua to life through your lens!

Hourly Range: $17.00-$19.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 01:46 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Videography
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Videography
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Seeking a Skilled VideoScribe Editor for my YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hi there,

I'm Ivan, the creator behind Vanilla Investor, a platform dedicated to making personal finance and investing easy to understand. My YouTube channel (https://www.youtube.com/@vanillainvestor) has been growing steadily, and I post weekly videos every Sunday focused on investment strategies, financial planning, and wealth-building tips.

Balancing content creation with my full-time job in the finance field at a forex broker has become challenging, and I'm now looking for a talented VideoScribe editor to help bring my ideas to life.

Here’s what I need:

- VideoScribe Expertise: I need someone who can transform scripts and voiceovers into engaging whiteboard animations using VideoScribe. Ideally, you should have a VideoScribe license, allowing you to use the template I provide and let me make any final adjustments if needed.
- Multimedia Integration: Beyond creating the whiteboard animation, it would be great if you could add sound effects and some B-roll to enhance the final video.
- File Handling: I will provide the script, voiceover, and stock images and videos for the animation. You’ll integrate these elements seamlessly to produce a polished final product.
- Editing & Creativity: Your job will be to edit and animate the content into a cohesive final product that aligns with Vanilla Investor's style and messaging.
- Collaboration: I’m looking for someone interested in building a long-term working relationship. Ideally, we can work together to regularly produce 1 video per week.

Is this something you're interested in for a long-term partnership? If so, please take a look at my YouTube channel for an idea of my current content and style.

Looking forward to your response and hopefully to working together!

Best regards,

Ivan  
Vanilla Investor  
https://www.vanillainvestor.com
https://www.youtube.com/@vanillainvestor

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 18, 2024 01:23 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:VideoScribe, Whiteboard Animation, Animated Explainer, Explainer Video, 2D Animation, Video Post-Editing
Skills: VideoScribe, Whiteboard Animation, Animated Explainer, Explainer Video, 2D Animation, Video Post-Editing
Country: Malaysia
click to apply

item.title: Remote Videographer for Online Course Creation - Upwork
item.description:
Remote Videographer for Online Course Creation

I'm looking for a skilled videographer to join me in creating engaging video content for an upcoming online course.

This project spans six lessons, with five lessons each lasting 1.5 hours and one shorter lesson under 30 minutes. I have already developed the syllabus, workbook, slide decks, and assignments.

Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with me to plan and execute remote video shoots for the course.
- Provide expertise in setting up equipment and advising on effective filming techniques.
- Edit and refine video content to ensure it aligns seamlessly with the course materials and enhances the learning experience.
- Maintain clear communication and meet deadlines throughout the project duration.

Requirements:
- Proven experience in videography, particularly in educational or instructional content creation.
- Proficiency in video editing software to produce polished and professional final products.
- Familiarity with online course platforms (experience with Thinkific is a plus).
- A strong portfolio demonstrating previous work in video production for educational purposes.

If you are passionate about educational content creation and have the skills to bring my course materials to life through video, I'd love to hear from you. Please include your portfolio showcasing relevant work along with your application.


Budget: $1,500
Posted On: June 18, 2024 01:20 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video editor for Christian Children's TV show - Upwork
item.description:
I am producing a weekly Christian Children's TV show. I have the available raw footage. I will need a video editor to compete and prepare it for TV. This will also require occasional green screen footage and outside video clips. I will also need minimal animation work done and several motion graphics, as well.  These are 28-minute episodes and we will need 13 Episodes completed ASAP.  Also, I have a completed sample of an episode for review if you are interested. All episodes follow the exact format; transitions, intro, exit,  etc.  I am in a time crunch, so if you cannot work consistently until we finish the project, please do not reply.
